code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import backendURL from"../components/config";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ServicesPage=()=>{const[services,setServices]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchServices=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(backendURL,"/api/services"));setServices(response.data);};fetchServices();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"services-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Our Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"services-grid",children:services.map(service=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"servicepage-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:service.image,alt:service.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:service.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:service.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/services/".concat(service.id),className:"learn-more-btn",children:"Learn More"})]},service.id))})]});};export default ServicesPage;
